args.content:
import Mathlib

/- Reverse triangle inequality for real numbers:
   | |x| - |y| | ≤ |x - y|
-/

theorem jirilebl_reverse_triangle_1211 (x y : ℝ) :
  abs (abs x - abs y) ≤ abs (x - y) := by sorry
